subject: HS Pro Shifter Unusable
description_text:
Hello,

I just received my HS Pro shifter, installed it, installed the software and
I cannot use it. It is stuck in sequential mode, there's no tile in Simsonn
Manager like the instructions say to calibrate. What the hell is going on
here?

[image: image.png]

Jeff

conversations.body_text: Hi Jeffrey Fitzgerald,  We will release a new software version today, which will officially add support for the HS Pro calibration page. Please update the software and try it out.

Awesome, thank you! I guess I assumed based on the instruction manual.  The
shifter build itself feels amazing, I used it in sequential mode last night
anyway.

Also,  Happy New Year!

On Tue, Jan 6, 2026 at 11:03 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Jeffrey Fitzgerald,    Please uninstall SIMSONN Manager version 2.1.2 from your computer first, then download and install SIMSONN Manager version 2.1.3 from our official website.  SIMSONN Manager 2.1.3 adds full support for HS Pro 2-in-1 shifter configuration and calibration. Please use this version to complete the setup and calibration.     https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

Hello! I just went through calibration and the following sensors seem flipped: 7 & R That is the only slot where if I shift up to 7 it shows R. Shifting to R shows 7. Is that an easy fix? Thank you. Sent from my iPhone

Hi Jeffrey Fitzgerald,     Please try to recalibrate the shifter, and during the calibration process, make sure to engage the gears strictly in the following order: 1 → 2 → 3 → 4 → 5 → 6 → 7 → R.  After calibration, please test again and check whether gear 7 and Reverse are displayed correctly.
Hello, Thank you I’m all set, I’m going to rip some tires and leave review. Thank you for the quick service! Jeffrey Sent from my iPhone
